commit.message: Support absence of wallet (pwalletMain==NULL) in several locations, notably RPC.

files.patch:
@@ -132,6 +132,9 @@ string CRPCTable::help(string strCommand) const
             continue;
         if (strCommand != "" && strMethod != strCommand)
             continue;
+        if (pcmd->reqWallet && !pwalletMain)
+            continue;
+
         try
         {
             Array params;

 CRPCTable::CRPCTable()
@@ -1034,6 +1037,8 @@ json_spirit::Value CRPCTable::execute(const std::string &strMethod, const json_s
     const CRPCCommand *pcmd = tableRPC[strMethod];
     if (!pcmd)
         throw JSONRPCError(RPC_METHOD_NOT_FOUND, "Method not found");
+    if (pcmd->reqWallet && !pwalletMain)
+        throw JSONRPCError(RPC_METHOD_NOT_FOUND, "Method not found (disabled)");
 
     // Observe safe mode
     string strWarning = GetWarnings("rpc");
@@ -1048,7 +1053,10 @@ json_spirit::Value CRPCTable::execute(const std::string &strMethod, const json_s
         {
             if (pcmd->threadSafe)
                 result = pcmd->actor(params, false);
-            else {
+            else if (!pwalletMain) {
+                LOCK(cs_main);
+                result = pcmd->actor(params, false);
+            } else {
                 LOCK2(cs_main, pwalletMain->cs_wallet);
                 result = pcmd->actor(params, false);
             }

commit.message:
init.cpp: cosmetic code movement, preparing for no-wallet mode.

No behavior changes, just indentation changes.
Add -disablewallet option, to disable wallet support (and BDB)

RPC: Remove 'getwork' deprecated mining protocol

Use getblocktemplate instead.
Remove mentions of 4way miner in debian bitcoin.conf example/manpage

files.patch:
@@ -59,9 +59,6 @@ rpcsslprivatekeyfile=server.pem
 # Set gen=1 to attempt to generate bitcoins
 gen=0
 
-# Use SSE instructions to try to generate bitcoins faster.
-#4way=1
-
 # Pre-generate this many public/private key pairs, so wallet backups will be valid for
 # both prior transactions and several dozen future transactions.
 keypool=100

@@ -64,9 +64,6 @@ Acceptable ciphers (default: TLSv1+HIGH:\:!SSLv2:\:!aNULL:\:!eNULL:\:!AH:\:!3DES
 \fBgen=\fR[\fI'0'\fR|\fI'1'\fR]
 Enable or disable attempt to generate bitcoins.
 .TP
-\fB4way=\fR[\fI'0'\fR|\fI'1'\fR]
-Enable or disable use SSE instructions to try to generate bitcoins faster.
-.TP
 \fBkeypool=\fR\fI'100'\fR
 Pre-generate this many public/private key pairs, so wallet backups will be valid for both prior transactions and several dozen future transactions.
 .TP

@@ -56,9 +56,6 @@ rpcsslprivatekeyfile=server.pem
 
 # Miscellaneous options
 
-# Set gen=1 to attempt to generate bitcoins
-gen=0
-
 # Pre-generate this many public/private key pairs, so wallet backups will be valid for
 # both prior transactions and several dozen future transactions.
 keypool=100

@@ -16,12 +16,6 @@ Specify configuration file (default: bitcoin.conf)
 \fB\-pid=\fR<file>
 Specify pid file (default: bitcoind.pid)
 .TP
-\fB\-gen\fR
-Generate coins
-.TP
-\fB\-gen\fR=\fI0\fR
-Don't generate coins
-.TP
 \fB\-datadir=\fR<dir>
 Specify data directory
 .TP

@@ -61,9 +61,6 @@ Acceptable ciphers (default: TLSv1+HIGH:\:!SSLv2:\:!aNULL:\:!eNULL:\:!AH:\:!3DES
 .TP
 .SH MISCELLANEOUS OPTIONS
 .TP
-\fBgen=\fR[\fI'0'\fR|\fI'1'\fR]
-Enable or disable attempt to generate bitcoins.
-.TP
 \fBkeypool=\fR\fI'100'\fR
 Pre-generate this many public/private key pairs, so wallet backups will be valid for both prior transactions and several dozen future transactions.
 .TP

@@ -15,12 +15,6 @@ Bitcoins can be sent easily through the Internet, without having to trust middle
 \fB\-conf=\fR<file>
 Specify configuration file (default: bitcoin.conf)
 .TP
-\fB\-gen\fR
-Generate coins
-.TP
-\fB\-gen\fR=\fI0\fR
-Don't generate coins
-.TP
 \fB\-min\fR
 Start minimized
 .TP
@@ -108,18 +102,6 @@ Returns the block number of the latest block in the longest block chain.
 \fBgetconnectioncount\fR
 Returns the number of connections to other nodes.
 .TP
-\fBgetdifficulty\fR
-Returns the proof-of-work difficulty as a multiple of the minimum difficulty.
-.TP
-\fBgetgenerate\fR
-Returns boolean true if server is trying to generate bitcoins, false otherwise.
-.TP
-\fBsetgenerate 'generate' ['genproclimit']\fR
-Generation is limited to ['genproclimit'] processors, \-1 is unlimited.
-.TP
-\fBgethashespersec\fR
-Returns a recent hashes per second performance measurement while generating.
-.TP
 \fBgetinfo\fR
 Returns an object containing server information.
 .TP

@@ -85,8 +85,6 @@ Threads
  
 - ThreadRPCServer : Remote procedure call handler, listens on port 8332 for connections and services them.
  
-- ThreadBitcoinMiner : Generates bitcoins
-  
 - ThreadMapPort : Universal plug-and-play startup/shutdown
  
 - Shutdown : Does an orderly shutdown of everything

@@ -201,9 +201,6 @@ static const CRPCCommand vRPCCommands[] =
     { "addnode",                &addnode,                true,      true },
     { "getaddednodeinfo",       &getaddednodeinfo,       true,      true },
     { "getdifficulty",          &getdifficulty,          true,      false },
-    { "getgenerate",            &getgenerate,            true,      false },
-    { "setgenerate",            &setgenerate,            true,      false },
-    { "gethashespersec",        &gethashespersec,        true,      false },
     { "getinfo",                &getinfo,                true,      false },
     { "getmininginfo",          &getmininginfo,          true,      false },
     { "getnewaddress",          &getnewaddress,          true,      false },

commit.message:
Merge remote-tracking branch 'jgarzik/no-wallet' into walletless_miner

Conflicts:
	src/bitcoinrpc.cpp
	src/init.cpp
	src/rpcmining.cpp
